20101203022054.222|20101203022055.333|CCO|>> I UNDERSTAND --

20101203022329.143|20101203022330.571|CCO|BEGINNING, WAS DEFINED NOT BY

20101203022342.000|20101203022344.000|CCO|REALIZED THOSE RIGHTS BETTER,

20101203022416.000|20101203022418.000|CCO|SERVE IN THE MILITARY, BUT

20101203022448.667|20101203022450.333|CCO|HOW DO WE SQUARE THIS CIRCLE?

20101203022532.000|20101203022534.500|CCO|SO I CAN'T SQUARE IT.
20101203022534.500|20101203022537.000|CCO|>> SINCE THIS TIME, MY YEARS IN 
20101203022537.000|20101203022539.500|CCO|THE MILITARY, AND SINCE BEING IN
20101203022539.500|20101203022542.000|CCO|THIS POSITION, I'VE HAD THE 
20101203022542.000|20101203022544.000|CCO|OPPORTUNITY TO VISIT WALTER REED
20101203022544.000|20101203022546.000|CCO|AND, YOU KNOW, I STILL CAN'T GET

20101203022548.000|20101203022550.000|CCO|SAW A SOLDIER WHO LOST BOTH HIS

20101203022556.000|20101203022558.000|CCO|TORSO STRENGTHENED ENOUGH SO HE 
20101203022558.000|20101203022600.000|CCO|COULD STILL HAVE A VIABLE, YOU 
20101203022600.000|20101203022602.000|CCO|KNOW, AND FULFILLING LIFE, AND 
20101203022602.000|20101203022603.429|CCO|SEEING MANY OTHER INJURED MEN 
20101203022603.429|20101203022604.857|CCO|AND WOMEN, YOU KNOW, WHO HAVE 
20101203022604.857|20101203022606.286|CCO|NOT ONLY GIVEN THAT LIMBS, BUT 
20101203022606.286|20101203022607.714|CCO|THEIR LIVES.

20101203022614.000|20101203022616.000|CCO|ARE THEY GAY OR STRAIGHT?

20101203022618.000|20101203022620.000|CCO|BE HONEST WITH YOU.
20101203022620.000|20101203022622.000|CCO|I JUST WANTED TO KNOW IF THEY

20101203022624.000|20101203022626.000|CCO|YOU KNOW, WITH PRIDE AND WITH

20101203022630.000|20101203022632.000|CCO|DEMANDS IT.

20101203022635.333|20101203022638.667|CCO|IT FACIITATES IT.

20101203022643.667|20101203022645.333|CCO|ANY GRAVER BY THIS SINGLE POLICY

20101203022733.667|20101203022735.333|CCO|SERVICE CHIEF MYSELF.
20101203022735.333|20101203022737.000|CCO|FOR MORE THAN 40 YEARS, I HAVE 
20101203022737.000|20101203022738.667|CCO|MADE DECISIONS THAT AFFECTED AND

20101203022740.333|20101203022742.000|CCO|MEN AND WOMEN.

20101203022753.429|20101203022754.857|CCO|DECISIONS THAT THAT ADVICE 
20101203022754.857|20101203022756.286|CCO|INFORMS.
20101203022756.286|20101203022757.714|CCO|I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND REPEAL OF 
20101203022757.714|20101203022759.143|CCO|THIS LAW IF I DID NOT BELIEVE IN

20101203022800.571|20101203022802.000|CCO|THING TO DO FOR OUR MILITARY, 
20101203022802.000|20101203022803.667|CCO|FOR OUR NATION, AND FOR OUR 
20101203022803.667|20101203022805.333|CCO|COLLECTIVE HONOR.
20101203022805.333|20101203022807.000|CCO|>> TODAY WAS THE FIRST DAY OF 
20101203022807.000|20101203022808.667|CCO|TWO DAYS OF HEARINGS ON 
20101203022808.667|20101203022810.333|CCO|REPEALING THE POLICY AND 
20101203022810.333|20101203022812.000|CCO|PRACTICE OF FIRING AMERICANS 
20101203022812.000|20101203022813.667|CCO|FROM OUR MILITARY FOR THE CRIME 
20101203022813.667|20101203022815.333|CCO|OF BEING GAY.
20101203022815.333|20101203022817.000|CCO|TONIGHT ON THE INTERVIEW, A 
20101203022817.000|20101203022818.667|CCO|CURRENTLY SERVING ACTIVE DUTY 
20101203022818.667|20101203022820.333|CCO|UNITED STATES MILITARY OFFICER 
20101203022820.333|20101203022822.000|CCO|WHO IS GAY, SPEAKING OUT IN HIS 
20101203022822.000|20101203022823.429|CCO|FIRST EVER BROADCAST INTERVIEW.
20101203022823.429|20101203022824.857|CCO|ON A PERSONAL NOTE, THIS IS ONE

20101203023644.857|20101203023646.286|CCO|92% OF PEOPLE THAT KNEW SOMEONE
